title: 幂幂的秘密
content:
{
  "prompt_description": "Luxury Satellite Body Chain Harness Portrait",
  "subject": {
    "type": "Female model",

    "hair": "voluminous pink hair",
    "makeup": "Glamorous K-pop idol style makeup, defined eyeliner, soft blush, glossy lips, contact lenses",
    "notes": "Maintain the subject’s exact facial features, structure, skin tone, and identity from the uploaded image.",
    "eyes": {

  },
  "aspect_ratio": "3:4",

  ],
  "pose": {
    "overall_style": "Elegant yet highly seductive and glamorous pose, combining sophistication with intense sensuality and alluring vampishness",
    "body_position": "Slight three-quarter turn to camera, subtle S-curve body line with gently arched back and one hip slightly pushed out, shoulders relaxed but one shoulder subtly raised for asymmetry",
    "head_and_gaze": "Head slightly tilted downward with chin gently tucked, creating mysterious allure, while maintaining piercing direct eye contact with camera",
    "arms_and_hands": [
      "One hand delicately tracing fingertips along collarbone or lightly touching the central Y-drop chain at chest level, drawing attention to jewelry and cleavage",
      "Other hand gracefully resting on hip or lightly draped along side of body, fingers relaxed and elegant"
    ],
    "torso_and_chest": "Subtle forward lean of upper body to accentuate chest silhouette and jewelry drape, creating sensual tension without exaggeration",
    "expression_integration": "Pose enhances confident, slightly cold, seductive energy – body language that feels both regal and temptingly provocative"
  },
  "jewelry_details": {
    "core_item": "Intricate multi-layered body chain harness",
    "metal_type": "Fine silver chain, with a high-polish finish",
    "chain_texture": "CRITICAL DETAIL: Satellite chain style (delicate cable chain interspersed with small metal beads periodically), creating a shimmering, dotted texture across the skin",
    "structural_elements": [
      "Choker-style neck layered chains",
      "Draped chains cascading over shoulders (epaulet effect)",
      "Central vertical 'Y-drop' chain with crystal accents descending into cleavage",
      "CRITICAL STRUCTURE: Distinctive curved chains swooping from side ribs, under the bust, and converging at a central sparkling rhinestone point below the breasts, creating a cage/cupping visual frame"
    ],
    "accents": [
      "Sparkling clear zircon crystals at junction points",
      "Rhombus or star-shaped central chest crystal"
    ],
    "visual_effect": "Highly reflective, fluid drape, looking expensive and delicate"
  },
  "attire": {
    "type": "Deep-V structured corset or tailored evening top",
    "color": "Beige nude lace halter-neck bodysuit, sheer floral lace details, seductive style (to contrast sharply with the silver jewelry)",
    "fabric": "Matte or slight sheen fabric that allows the jewelry to stand out"
  },
  "lighting_and_atmosphere": {
    "style": "High-end commercial photography lighting",
    "Key_light": "Focused, dramatic lighting highlighting the chest area, causing the metal beads and crystals to sparkle intensely (specular highlights)",
    "mood": "Luxurious, glamorous, sophisticated"
  },
  "composition": {

    "focus": "Sharp focus on face, eyes, and jewelry details across the entire upper body from chest to clavicle",
